antiPatterns.name: Wrong Cuts
antiPatterns.description: Microservices are split on the basis of technical layers (presentation, business, and data layers) instead of business capabilities.
antiPatterns.consequences: The wrong separation of concerns and increased data-splitting complexity can occur.
antiPatterns.solution: Perform a clear analysis of business processes and the need for resources.
antiPatterns.source: On the Definition of Microservice Bad Smells
